job.title: Signal Software Engineer (TS/SCI with FS Poly Required)
job.description: If you are a 5 year Signal Software Engineer with a TSSCI and Full Scope Polygraph please read onltbrgtltbrgtWere a small engineering contractor that supports clients in the commercial and government sectors with RF Engineering Analog and Digital Hardware Audio and Video DSP application and embedded software engineering and more We have offices in Maryland Virginia and North Carolina and are currently looking for a Signal Software Engineer at one of these locationsltbrgtltbrgtAll candidates must have an active TSSCI clearance with a Full Scope Poly clearance in order to be consideredltbrgtltbrgtWhats In It for Youltbrgtltulgtltligt 100k180kyear base salary DOEltligtltligt Full company benefits medical dental vision short and longterm disabilityltligtltligt 401k with company match and moreltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Will Be Doingltbrgtltulgtltligt Develop MATLAB scrips for demodulation of digital modulation schemesltligtltligt Develop maintain and enhance signal processing software like detectors demodulators and protocol processorsltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt Active TSSCI clearance with a Full Scope Polygraphltligtltligt Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related fieldltligtltligt 7 years of related engineering experience focused on Radio Frequencyltligtltligt Fourier transforms filtering digital modulation error control codingltligtltligt Communication theoryltligtltligt Signal Analysis tools WVT DVT etcltligtltligt Digital signal processing adaptive beamformingfiltering demodulationltbrgtltligtltulgtBONUS POINTSltbrgtltulgtltligt Software defined radio architectures SCA REDHAWK GNUltligtltligt Commercial wireless standardsltligtltligt Geolocation
